revised_title: Daniel Dumaresq's Contributions to Anglo-Russian Science and Culture
tldr: This article explores the life and work of Daniel Dumaresq, a 18th-century Channel Islander who promoted Anglo-Russian science and culture. Dumaresq was a supporter of scientific exchange between England and Russia, fostering connections with the Russian Academy of Sciences and the Royal Society. He facilitated the sharing of knowledge, resources, and ideas, contributing to the development of science in both countries.
